misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
vulnerable_code:
KeyGenerator keyGen = KeyGenerator.getInstance("IDEA");
Cipher cipher = Cipher.getInstance("IDEA");
description: The code is using the IDEA cryptographic algorithm, which is considered weak and insecure. It has been largely replaced by more secure algorithms like AES.
recommendation: Replace the IDEA algorithm with a more secure algorithm like AES.
